name: WebAR Training Simulator
description:
Instructions

Altitude 

W / s or left joystick up / down

Rotate
A / d or left joystick left / right

Move front / back
Arrows up / right or right joystick up / down 

Move sideways
Arrows left / right or right joystick left / right 

Land
L or gamepad cross

Take off
Space or gamepad triangle

Pause
Escape or gamepad options

Instructions
I or gamepad share
